description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote procedure call runtime remote code execution vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-20678:

1. Apply the updates corresponding to the KB Articles listed below.
2. Ensure that all relevant build numbers are covered during the update process.
3. Restart the affected systems to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- Update packages available for this vulnerability are specified in the KB articles. Ensure to check your system against the build numbers provided to confirm compatibility.
- For more details and steps to follow, visit the official Microsoft Update Guide at: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-20678.

**Preconditions**:
- It is recommended to have backup data before proceeding with the updates.
